Key Match Events: Captain Vincent Aboubakar, Christian Bassogog, Bryan Mbeumo, and Martin Hongla, had a brilliant performance, each scoring in the match.
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Engin Firat expressed much confidence ahead of the encounter, however, the outcome did not come as expected.
Post-Match Reflections: The victory secured Cameroon a comfortable lead in group J with seven points ahead of Zimbabwe with five points, Kenya four points, and Namibia with no point.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indomitable Lions eased past the Harambee Stars of Kenya in a 4-1 win at the Ahmadou Ahidjo Stadium on match day 3 of the AFCON 2025 qualifiers.
Others: Marc Brys and his team will travel to Uganda for the second leg of the fixture against Kenya on Monday, October 14.
